item.title: OpenShift - GWT Tutorial - CodeTab
item.description: 12.2.Â GWT OpenShift Project Project fins developed so far is configured for App Engine and there are two options to deploy its code on OpenShift. create a new project and import the code. modify the existing project. As we are exploring the functionalities of OpenShift with a demo application, we suggest you to go with a new project. For a live project, we suggest the second one. Create a new project In this method, we create a new project and import the fins.
